title: Pset_CableCarrierSegmentTypeCableLadderSegment
description:
An open carrier segment on which cables are carried on a ladder structure.
HISTORY: IFC4 - NominalLength deleted. To be handled as a quantity measure.

NominalWidth.title: NominalWidth
NominalWidth.description: The nominal width of the segment.

NominalHeight.title: NominalHeight
NominalHeight.description: The nominal height of the segment.

LadderConfiguration.title: LadderConfiguration
LadderConfiguration.description: Description of the configuration of the ladder structure used.
